def_cn: （改变）巨大的，重大的；（任务）庞大的，艰巨的
def_en: You can use mammoth to emphasize that a task or change is very large and needs a lot of effort to achieve.

def_cn: 猛犸，毛象（一种史前动物）
def_en: A mammoth was an animal like an elephant, with very long tusks and long hair, that lived a long time ago but no longer exists.
